title: Mr. Magkaisa
author: Mr. Magkaisa
content: - Hello guys to my friends here in this forum, I just want to show and share a video clip movie where the scene of this show is where the bitcoin is inserted while the 2 characters in this movie are in the car talking to each other and the radio was turned on for a while and you can hear the announcer say that the price of a bitcoin is about 1.25M$ each. After that, there was nothing, because the theme of the movie was gold mining.He was quite boring when I watched it because I thought the theme was about bitcoin but it wasn't. Now, what I'm wondering is why the price of bitcoin was inserted into the car's radio station when the character opened it? Is it possible that the director or the producer intended for the viewer to hear and see this thing? What do you think?If you think about it and let's look at it, it's a very good feeling and a lot of fun if that's the price of a Bitcoin, that is if you have bitcoin holdings in the long term.Source : https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=fR2Yvu6jY5U

comments.author: NeuroticFish
comments.body: Quote from: Mr. Magkaisa on November 05, 2022, 01:04:23 PMwhat I'm wondering is why the price of bitcoin was inserted into the car's radio station when the character opened it? 1. It worth mentioning that the radio scene is around minute 8:152. Bitcoin in movies is nothing new. Most probably that news is meant to emphasize that the action happens in a more or less distant future. Nothing else.

comments.author: rat03gopoh
comments.body: Investors don't watch fictional movies.There's nothing out of the ordinary to care about, movies shouldn't be something that should be a deliberation of bitcoin speculation. Directors sometimes need hyperbole scenes just to appeal to certain groups, especially future-themed films.

comments.author: franky1
comments.body: movie producers love to add "hot topic" items into scripts/scenes to get different interest groups/communities mentioning the movieEG certain hot topic actors from different genre type cast movies being put into one movie to encourage more people from different genres to watch the moviesometimes the producer might have a persona interest in bitcoin and use his title to sway the screen writers to adapt a scene to mention it. sometimes there is a company that is interested in it that sponsors a scene (product placement)sometimes it can simply be the producer looking at whats trending in investments and deciding bitcoin seems like a modern thing to mention to spark some discussionthere is a topic on this forum that mentions many TV shows and movies that mention bitcoin. i beleive the first big mention of a internationally show tv show was "the good wife" then came alot of the usual ones including the simpsonsyou would be quite surprised how many tv shows and movies have now mentioned bitcoin for some reason or other

comments.author: Rikafip
comments.body: Quote from: franky1 on November 05, 2022, 04:29:04 PMsometimes it can simply be the producer looking at whats trending in investments and deciding bitcoin seems like a modern thing to mention to spark some discussionSince this movie was made in the late 2020/early 2021 (beginning of the bull run) and released in the early 2022, I guess this might be it as bitcoin was getting a lot of attention then.Quote from: NeuroticFish on November 05, 2022, 01:10:03 PM Most probably that news is meant to emphasize that the action happens in a more or less distant future. Nothing else.That movie is actually set in the near future. All I know is that i wouldn't mind hearing numbers like those in a couple of years or so.  @OP I wouldn't put too much thought into it as we are far from early days and a lot of people have been heard about bitcoin already.

comments.author: Accardo
comments.body: Such scene is not bad for a fiction movie. Movie directors and script writers insert different flairs normally to attract people's attention. Recently, Bitcoin is considered a digital gold so the movie is directed towards mining Gold and since mining is a term for Bitcoin it's not a bad idea to speculate bitcoin in a smart way like the director did. Saw viral tweets about the movie because of that particular scene. Now, I just viewed the movie through the link you shared. The aim of the director has been achieved and he/she did a great job for promoting Bitcoin and at same promoting the the movie through Bitcoin.

comments.author: cabron
comments.body: Radio and  TV shows insert these things somehow. It's not new anymore. I recently watched the TV series OA, there was a scene where a Vietnamese shows her ETH wallet worth around $31,00 which her granddaughter got from a Meta game.The commentator probably heard it from Cathy Woods who also predicted BTC to be more than a million in 2030. Followers always echo whats been said to them.

comments.author: Upgrade00
comments.body: Quote from: Mr. Magkaisa on November 05, 2022, 01:04:23 PMIf you think about it and let's look at it, it's a very good feeling and a lot of fun if that's the price of a Bitcoin, that is if you have bitcoin holdings in the long term.A random mention of Bitcoin in a movie scene does not indicate price action or movements. As mentioned already, it could be a sort of "click bait", to help with advertising of the movie, by getting users to share that particular scene and publicize the movie. Movies do this with subtitles and use of certain trending topics to boost the marketing.$1.25 million is a probable amount within the next 5 decades or so, but who would hold that long?

comments.author: OgNasty
comments.body: I thought it was a good easter egg and I watched the movie before hearing about it.  I also thought it was a good movie that displays how mistrust can hurt everyone.  I recommend watching it if anyone is looking for a good movie to see.  I was a bit shocked when I heard Bitcoin mentioned and when I originally heard it I didn't think anything of it, as I didn't catch the price part.  I was just happy to see Bitcoin found it's way into another mainstream media production.  It does show that there are a lot of folks who still believe in Bitcoin though, even in a bear market.  That can only be a good thing.

comments.author: cryptomaniac_xxx
comments.body: Well it's good if we are going to see the price of bitcoin along that line in the future. However, this is just a movie, so it's fiction the best and maybe the director or someone involved in the creation of the movie just wanted to insert it, maybe he is a bitcoin enthusiast after all. And it's a win win for them, just like the OP, he was caught with the price being mentioned in the movie and now trying to spread it here in our community. Nevertheless, this is just a mere speculation and again, fiction that we shouldn't take very seriously.

comments.author: Cointxz
comments.body: Bitcoin price is hot topic in US since many people is investing on it and waiting for the price pump. Most of the US investors on social media is predicting astronomical price such as 1M or so. The director might use it to incorporate on his movie since the theme is all about getting rich and Bitcoin is very popular on this category.The most iconic television program that features Bitcoin properly is Big bang theory since they explain Bitcoin and Blockchain in Eli5 format and this sitcom is the most popular in US when they air the episode.

comments.author: Daltonik
comments.body: What's interesting to me is that the atmosphere of the film is more like a post-apocalypse, while the radio is working, albeit intermittently, but the announcer can be heard and we are talking about quotes and the price of bitcoin, including, I think the author decided to emphasize, among other things, the network's resistance to such disasters, so it's not surprising that the price reached $ 1.25 million.

comments.author: ethereumhunter
comments.body: Yes, maybe it could happen in the future and I wouldn't be surprised if it came true and look forward to seeing it later. I am sure bitcoin users will want to wait for that moment because they will make a huge profit later.Maybe the director or producer sees bitcoin's popularity has grown among the public and wants to see how the audience will react if he mentions the highest number that bitcoin will achieve in the future. And I think it's normal for the producer to include bitcoin in his video clips.
